description: âœ¨ Glass morphism library for Jetpack Compose with AGSL shaders (Android 13+). Supports blur, distortion, shadows, and more.

name: Gursimarsingh12/Composive
description: Composive is a powerful Kotlin Multiplatform UI library for building responsive and adaptive user interfaces across Android, iOS, Desktop, and Web. Effortlessly create cross-platform apps with automatic theme adaptation, responsive layouts, and platform-aware components using Jetpack Compose Multiplatform.

name: Shoaibkhalid65/BottomBars
description: This repository demonstrates the use of Material 3's Bottom App Bar for screen-specific actions and explores various Bottom Navigation Bars in Jetpack Compose, including navigation with the Navigation Component and custom bottom bar designs.
